SEHR INTERESSANT

初中玩的来着？忘了，那时候没钱，下了盗版。
现在盗版转正的，很好玩的游戏，本来想和steam小伙伴联机，结果老是连接失败，还没有盗版联机平台稳定，唉……
游戏音效（尤其是弹跳黏胶和加速黏胶），不知道为啥听得头皮发麻，我听塑料泡沫的声音也会头皮发麻，这是我个人问题，但是我就是想说(σﾟ∀ﾟ)σ..:*☆
最后重申，很经典的解谜游戏，但是联机太渣（别问我为什么不用加速器，我的小伙伴都不用，我没办法）。

bestes Spiel
Campaign 100000/10

OH MON DIEU !!!!!
Ce jeu est le meilleur jeu auquel j'ai joué et auquel j'ai été adicte. Un gameplay déjà innovant devenu excellent grâce aux nouveaux éléments qui lui ont été ajouté. Une histoire extrêmement captivante comme Valve sait les faire. Et le mode co-op en ligne ou local est très bon lui aussi. Le seul petit défaut que ce jeu a est son workshop dans lequel on peut se perdre facilement mais il s'agit plus d'un problème de Steam et non du jeu. Malgré ce petit problème, on trouve des maps formidables, bien souvent moddé (merci le Source Engine) 

Bref, je recommande vivement Portal 2 à n'importe qui. 

PS : Si je devais attribuer une note à Portal 2, ce serait 17/20 (d'après des stats de satisfaction sortie de mon cerveau)
very fun and makes me feel big brain

퍼즐 디자인이 너무 정교하면서도 과감해서, 이런 걸 만드는 사람들 머릿속이 궁금할 지경이었다.
아무튼 퍼즐도 재밌지만 그와중에 시나리오나 캐릭터 설정도 진부하지 않고 재밌다.
혼자 해도 재밌고, 둘이 하면 더 재밌다.
유저들이 만든 퍼즐도 다운받아서 즐길 수 있는 모양이다.

내가 이 게임을 지우는 유일한 이유는,
이거만 붙들고 있으면 스팀에 쟁여놓은 나머지 150여 개의 게임을 죽을 때까지 못할 것이기 때문이다.
best story based game on steam by far get it now or be less happy than you would be

The most fun part about this game is playing all the custom levels built by other users.  Including building your own levels.  Some are pretty simple/basic others are pretty tough but all are passable. Co-op can be fun if you find the right players.  But there should have been a co-op vs another co-op.  Now that... could be interesting.
Great

An amazing sequel to an already amazing game, Portal 2 is one of the best and most fun games i've ever played along with the first, the puzzles are well made, the voice acting is fabulous and it has hours upon hours of fun with the co-op play, tho i personaly suggest you to play that one with your friends instead of randos.

Overall the best game ive played and see myself playing for quite a long time.





oh and one more thing, the cake is a lie.
